 2021-08852021-08-11TBS,  TB,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Unauthorized Reimbursements Made Under the Public Service Health Care Plan Remission Order
PrecisCERTAIN UNAUTHORIZED REIMBURSEMENTS MADE UNDER THE PUBLIC SERVICE HEALTH CARE PLAN REMISSION ORDER in order to remit past reimbursements paid under the Public Service Health Care Plan (PSHCP) to former employees of the Freshwater Fish Marketing Corporation, and Canadian Wheat Board, and their dependants, who are or were in receipt of a pension benefit under the Public Service Superannuation Act but who were not eligible to join the plan.
AttachmentsAttachment
